sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, UseEffect } from 'react' import StockMiniChart from './stock_mini_chart.svg' import './CryptoList.css' class TradeCryptoHistoryList extends React.Component { render() { const [data, setData] = useState([]) const [sortType, setSortType] = useState('name') return (

Trading history

{this.props.portfolioData.trades.map(c =>(

{c.name}

Fill date: {c.created_at}

Trade type: {c.trade_type.toUpperCase()}

Filled quantity: {c.quantity} {c.symbol.toUpperCase()} at ${c.price}

))}
) } } export default TradeCryptoHistoryList
